mapper.insert: insert into board_reply (re_no, bd_no, re_content, re_writer, re_rnum, re_date ) values (re_seq.nextval, #{bd_no}, #{re_content}, #{re_writer}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(re_rnum),0)+1 FROM board_reply WHERE bd_no = #{bd_no}), SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select * from board_reply where bd_no = #{bd_no} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(re_rnum) DESC
